title: LF for dedicated players for competitive clash games
body:
Hi guys, 
I am looking for a mid, adc and top laners who are willing to join our clash team for this Friday.

I am a competitive, supportive and non-toxic players, so i hope you guy are the same if  you want to join. You need to be actively online everyday.

Add me if you are interested. 

Cheers

replies.body:
Im interested, im silver v at the moment, was gold v last season, i usually main mid or ADC however im flexible and have a decent range of champions i can play in jg, im pretty cool headed and don't tend to get tilted.
Summoner ID: Orangeruffy                     
Available hours
Monday - all day
Tuesday - 4pm onwards (i work on and off)
Wednesday - Usually unavailable
Thursday - 4pm onwards (i work on and off)
Friday - 4pm onwards
Saturday - All day (some times i go out with my girlfriend or other friends)
Sunday - All day (some times i go out with my girlfriend or other friends)
